title: New Item
body:
i feel like there is just a lack of build paths for AD Assassins{{champion:238}} {{champion:91}}{{champion:157}} {{champion:105}}   so i thought i might try spark an idea for rito :)
attackspeed= A, attack damage=B, your mr= C
{{item:1042}} {{item:1037}}+1400g  builds into A= half of C, B = 25% of C
Active= 60s CD, Your auto attacks deal damage to Enemy champion dealing 30% of their current magic resist for 8 Seconds.

This is just an idea and i am aware that what im submitting will either be super OP or just bad, but i feel something like this could help build paths on AD assassins 

If you make this item Riot, name idea=King Minigorophans Enchanted blade XDXDXDXD

replies.body:
There isnt really a lack of build paths/items for AD assassins. there's the pretty staple armor penetration items: {{item:3142}} ,{{item:3071}} ,{{item:3035}} ; throw in some lifesteal/more AD/%hp dmg: {{item:3153}} ,{{item:3072}} , {{item:3074}} ; then add a defensive item or two : {{item:3102}} ,{{item:3139}} , {{item:3156}} ,{{item:3026}} .
including boots, you have plenty of items to build, and 70% of them build out of {{item:1036}} so you even have a cheap build path.

Moving on to your item suggestion, it just doesn't work, you're not going to be building MR against AD assassins so having an item that does damage based on their MR makes no sense, except in the one scenario of your team dealing mostly magic damage ie: {{champion:57}}top , {{champion:113}}jung, {{champion:42}} adc  and you being the only real AD threat, in which case if I was the other team why not just build MR anyway and kill you first?
you have built in MR, buy the time you can afford this item enemies will have around 45-60 MR
Yeah kinda takes away kassadins role of being anti- mage.. sounds op but can be tweaked ofc. Not bad
attack damage is not mi gated by magic resist. mabey a physical damage dfg?
lets just delete zed then and forget he's in the game
